content: rather than a literal step by step pattern i have written out how i made this simple yet very effective blanket in a blog post format i give guidance on the granny square how much yarn i used and what yarn i used along with details about creating the border it is a large-ish baby blanket measuring approx 89cm i used stylecraft special dk and my trusty 3 75mm hook a 4mm is fine 2 balls of the main colour and extra for the border
